sect2.title: Installation de gdm
sect2.para: Installez gdm en lançant les commandes suivantes:

screen.userinput: groupadd gdm && useradd -c gdm -d /dev/null -g gdm -s /bin/bash gdm && ./configure --prefix=/opt/gnome2 --sysconfdir=/etc/gnome \ --localstatedir=/var/lib --with-pam-prefix=/etc && make && make install
